Xnope.Defs.BackstoryDef.title: Carny brat
Xnope.Defs.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME was raised on the road by HIS caretakers, who happened to roll with a roaming carnival on an outer rim world. On the road, NAME learned a well-rounded balance of skills in order to maintain HIS place in the caravan. Times weren't always great, but at least there was no shortage of the interesting and the new.

Xnope.Defs.BackstoryDef.title: Carnival prodigy
Xnope.Defs.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: When NAME was born, everyone knew HE was special. Raised by carnies and naturally gifted in all that HE attempted, NAME made a name for HIMself as one of the youngest and most brilliant acts in the show. This early fame has led to a few... narcissistic tendencies, however.

Xnope.Defs.BackstoryDef.title: Gypsy child
Xnope.Defs.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Folks used to say that gypsies are an ancient human culture often gifted with powers of foresight, and that is why they have been fortunate enough in their wanderlust to have survived the eons since their genesis on Earth. NAME was raised by HIS mother, a rare woman fabled to have descended from these great wandering folk.

Xnope.Defs.BackstoryDef.title: Carnival announcer
Xnope.Defs.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: It was NAME's job to be a constant stream of shiny talk and information in order to hold the rubes' attentions. HECAP is adept at thinking quickly on the spot, and always seems to know just what to say.

Xnope.Defs.BackstoryDef.title: Carnival announcer
Xnope.Defs.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: It was NAME's job to be a constant stream of shiny talk and information in order to hold the rubes' attentions. HECAP is adept at thinking quickly on the spot, and always seems to know just what to say.

Xnope.Defs.BackstoryDef.title: Carnival weirdo
Xnope.Defs.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: All NAME had to do for HIS act was be HIMself. When hands were short, HE made HIMself useful by being quite the eccentric in the kitchen tent.

Xnope.Defs.BackstoryDef.title: Carnival razorback
Xnope.Defs.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Either nobody remembers or nobody is permitted to remember why NAME was permanently demoted to a razorback, or a grunt in the carnival workforce. Loading and unloading pack animals and carriages have made HIM strong, as well as a regular contender whenever a brawl breaks out.

Xnope.Defs.BackstoryDef.title: Rim world gypsy
Xnope.Defs.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Folks used to say that gypsies are an ancient human culture often gifted with powers of foresight, and that is why they have been fortunate enough in their wanderlust to have survived the eons since their genesis on Earth. NAME identifies as a gypsy, though whether that is true remains to be known.

Xnope.Defs.BackstoryDef.title: Carnival dancer
Xnope.Defs.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME was always lauded for HIS beauty and grace, and when HE dances, the crowd goes into a mesmerised trance. Albeit, it doesn't take much to be a thing of beauty on a rim world...

Xnope.Defs.BackstoryDef.title: Carnival beastmaster
Xnope.Defs.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME handled pack animals for many years, and eventually got HIS own show demonstrating HIS beasts doing incredible tricks.

Xnope.Defs.BackstoryDef.title: Carnival vendor
Xnope.Defs.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME was recognised as a superior haggler when HE joined the carnival. HIS talents became especially useful during fireball shows...
